posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
Has the corners of a 4-5 card and a really nice and clean Ad Back.  Only real issue is there are a few really tiny paper flakes on the right border (see scan).  Just about the nicest T3 Johnson you will ever see with a likely technical grade of a 2-3 range.

$1850
